info.title: Navigate forwards into a checkbox group in reading mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusBeforeFirstCheckbox
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the first checkbox
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link before the first checkbox
testPageDocument.querySelector('#beforelink').focus();

user: Navigate forwards into the checkbox group.
instructions.raw: Navigate forwards into the checkbox group.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.
